string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: Swish, 2-floor restaurant and cocktail bar mixing European and Modern Irish flavours.
Chic cafe/bar and club with dining, conference facilities and rooftop bar, spread over 4 floors.
Fitzgeralds Park or Fitzgerald Park is a public park in Cork city and the location of the Cork Public Museum.
Fota Wildlife Park is a 100-acre wildlife park located on Fota Island
96FM is one of three local radio stations licensed by the Broadcasting Commission of Ireland for Cork City and County in Ireland
Traders selling organic and locally produced food in an 18th-century covered market.
Blarney Castle is a medieval stronghold in Blarney, near Cork, Ireland.
